# Installation
> `npm install --save @types/vara`

# Summary
This package contains type definitions for vara (https://github.com/akzhy/vara#readme).

# Details
Files were exported from https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/tree/master/types/vara.
